Key Match Events: Bahrain scored an equalizer through Mohamed Marhoon in the 90+9th minute
The Indonesian national team was 2-1 ahead until eight minutes of injury time
Post-Match Reflections: Indonesian national team coach Shin Tae-yong expressed disappointment about the referee's leadership
Shin Tae-yong called the referee's decision in this match biased
Indonesian national team players protested the referee's decision at the end of the match
Indonesian national team manager, Sumardji, received a red card for protesting too loudly
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was full of controversy
Referee Ahmed Al Kaf gave six minutes of extra time in the second half but allowed the match to end for nine minutes
Bahrain scored through Mohamed Marhoon in the 15th minute and 90+8′
Indonesia scored through Ragnar Oratmangoen in the 45+2nd minute and Rafael Struick 74′
